definition[0]: to make it difficult for someone to do something
example[0]: She tried to run, but was hampered by her heavy suitcase.
example[1]: An attempt to rescue the men has been hampered by bad weather.
definition[1]: a basket with a lid, which is used for carrying food or sending it to someone as a present
example[3]: They sent us a lovely Christmas hamper.
definition[2]: a large basket that you put dirty clothes in until they can be washed
